name: Islands Adventure
overview: Islands Adventure is a text adventure for the Dragon 32/64. The player has become stranded on a small, desolate island. The goal is to survive by finding fresh water, food, shelter, and ultimately, escape from the island. The player's current thirst, hunger, and shelter are displayed. All available movements are displayed on the screen. The player can hold five items at a time, and inventory is displayed on the screen. All commands are via VERB NOUN entry, and there is no save/restore feature.
